name: Mythical Beast Major Manticore
text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 2 Spell Counters on this card when that Spell resolves. Once per turn: You can remove 3 Spell Counters from your field; Special Summon 1 "Mythical Beast" monster from your hand, GY, or face-up Extra Deck except "Mythical Beast Major Manticore".
pendulum_text: If you have no card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 card you control that has a Spell Counter; Destroy it and this card, and if you do, Add 1 Pendulum monster from your Deck to your hand.
